titles.title: To amend the Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act.

bill.summary: 10/21/1999--Introduced. Amends the Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act to exclude from the definition of "farm labor contracting activity" a migrant or seasonal agricultural worker in a carpool arrangement. Exempts an agricultural employer or association from confirming the registration of a farm labor contractor who supplies only worker transportation services unless the employer or association had actual knowledge that the transportation was not a worker carpooling arrangement. Subjects motor vehicle safety insurance provisions to State, rather than specified Federal, requirements.
